datacite.title: DLSCORE: A deep learning based scoring function for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity
datacite.description: A deep learning approach to accurately predict protein-ligand binding affinities by using an ensemble of fully connected dense neural networks.

input.description: file[0] is the ligand pdbqt file, file[1] is the receptor pdbqt file

output.description: Dictionary full of pKd binding affinity predicted values.
